title: Bug 114470 - Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: There is an error message that throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as the value in a table filter.
OB: When using new Date("3/2/2005") as the value in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: No error message should be thrown when using new Date("3/2/2005") as the value in a table filter.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column.
2. Insert a table and create a filter based on the datetime column.
3. In the value1 field of the filter, input new Date("3/2/2005") as the value.
